data.title: Lynden Pindling International Airport
data.meta_description: Please note that our general office hours are as follows: 9:00am - 5:00pm The airport is located 10 miles 16km West of downtown Nassau. There are no hotels on site. Hotels closest to the airport are located at Cable Beach 6km/3.5 miles from the airport and include: - A Stone's Throw Away tel: 327 7030 website: astonesthrowaway.com - Orange Hill Inn tel: 327 7157 website: www.orangehill.com - Sandals Royal Bahamian tel:888-726-3257 website: www.sandals.com - Melia Nassau Beach Resort tel: 327 6000 website: www.melia.com - Grand Hyatt Baha Mar Resort tel: 788 8000 website: www.bahamar.com - Rosewood Baha Mar tel: 788 5800 website: rosewoodhotels.com - SLS Baha Mar tel: 866-225-4561 website: sbe.com - SuperClub Breezes tel: 407-537-9478 website: www.breezesresorts.com Vernice Walkine, President and CEO Paula Rigby, Vice President, Finance and CFO Deborah Coleby, Vice President, Operations Jan Knowles, Vice President, Marketing & Commercial Development Kevin McDonald, Vice President, Maintenance & Engineering Air Canada T: 377-8220 F: 377-1706 Air Jamaica T: 377-3300/1 American Eagle T: 377-8001 F: 377-7998 Bahamasair T: 377-8451 Ext. 2125 F: 377-7409 British Airways T: 377-2338 F: 377-6113 Continental Airlines T: 377-5486 Cubana Airlines T: 377-3460 F: 377-3460 Gulfstream Airlines T: 377-2131 / T: 377-4314 F: 377-2118 Delta Airlines T: 377-1042 / 53 F: 377-1063 JetBlue Airways T: 377-1174 / 5 F: 377-1180 Spirit Airlines T: 377-0150-2 F: 377-0149 United Airlines T: 377-7035 F: 377-3782 U.S. Airways T: 377-8886 F: 377-6496 West Jet Airlines T: 377-7035 F: 377-5239 USA 3000 T: 377-7035 F: 377-7035 Platinum Air Services T: 377-7035 F: 377-7035 Miami Air T: 377-7035 F: 377-7035 CanJet T: 377-7035 F: 377-7035 First Choice Airlines T: 377-7035 377-7035 Cat Island Air T: 377-3495 F: 377-3723 Flamingo Air T: 377-0364 / T: 377-0354 F: 377-0364 LeAir Charter T: 377-2356 F: 377-2357 Pineapple Air T: 377-0140 F: 377-1758 Sky Bahamas T :377-8777 377-3107 Southern Air T: 377-2014 / 5 F: 377-1066 Western Air T: 377-2222 F: 377-0025 Sky King T: 427-3332
data.text:
Description

Please note that our general office hours are as follows: 9:00am - 5:00pm

The airport is located 10 miles (16km) West of downtown Nassau.

There are no hotels on site. Hotels closest to the airport are located at Cable Beach (6km/3.5 miles from the airport) and include:

- A Stone's Throw Away (tel: 327 7030 website: astonesthrowaway.com)

- Orange Hill Inn (tel: 327 7157 website: www.orangehill.com)

- Sandals Royal Bahamian (tel:888-726-3257 website: www.sandals.com)

- Melia Nassau Beach Resort (tel: 327 6000 website: www.melia.com)

- Grand Hyatt Baha Mar Resort (tel: 788 8000 website: www.bahamar.com)

- Rosewood Baha Mar (tel: 788 5800 website: rosewoodhotels.com)

- SLS Baha Mar (tel: 866-225-4561 website: sbe.com

- SuperClub Breezes (tel: 407-537-9478 website: www.breezesresorts.com)
